mapper.select: select count(*) from ( select s.surveynum surveynum, s.teachernum teachernum, mb.name name, s.surveytitle surveytitle, TO_CHAR(s.surveywrittendate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') surveywrittendate, TO_CHAR(s.surveystartdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') surveystartdate, TO_CHAR(s.surveyenddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') surveyenddate from survey s, memberbasic mb, memberstaff ms where s.teachernum = 1 and s.teachernum = ms.teachernum and mb.membernum = ms.membernum )
